posts.content:
Yup, cool bus. 15s have got a lot of fuss in recent years...

(Edit: stupid comments from me, sorry. No excuse.... )

the bus driver wrote:
blistered wrote:Can't believe no-one is interested in this! Not even a call to try and haggle on the price?!

I guess everyone is happier buying cheapo Brazilian buses now instead of a well built, fully sorted German 15 window.


You gotta ask yourself, and be dead honest. Would you be interested in this bus if it came up for sale? yes/no.. why.. then think would you pay the asking price.. yes/no.. why..

It's been featured in a mag and therefore known in the scene.. a lot of people care about that as people like to put their name on a certain vehicle..
The price .. it's not cheap and I can imagine it will put people off.. don't forget 35K is a lot of money. In my humble opinion for that money I would like to have proper seats instead of t-shirts..

Don't get me wrong, I hope you can sell it.. it's definitely a cool bus


IMO it's priced right for the current value of a German 15 window tbh. I'm fully aware of how much £35k, that's the reason I'm selling. I have other things in my life that need money spending on them and they're all more important than owning this particular bus. I love it to pieces but sometimes you just have to go with your head instead of your heart.

As for the seat covers, a pair of TMI ones is about £350. I'll happily knock that off the price. No-one has even tried to barter

I for 1 think this is ace and priced spot on
I'd would love it sitting on my drive if I had the funds

If I was 10 years younger I would have had this no problem and think the price is spot on, I did find my 15 window only a few weeks ago and paid much much more however stick with it Bud a buyer will come along.

Cool bus

Ron

Back to this old cherry eh........five eggs...who knows what a vans worth, does it matter, it's his van so he can ask what he likes, he's not making anyone buy it, if you do..fair play, it's what it's worth to him....not anyone else..
If there is a price guide out there then send me a copy , I might have sold my panel to cheep, but, I got what I asked, I rekon I'd have got more but I was happy with what I got, and that's the break....he wants X, you want to pay Y then look elsewhere.
Sorry, but I read..hear this all the time, personally, good luck to the guy, for sure, if it stays there with out a sniff then he may drop his price, but you can allways come down but not up...

Good luck.

Rocket Ron

Still for sale.

Feel free to make an offer, don't ask, don't get and all that!
Be patient man, it's a killer bus and only takes one person that wants it!
yup be patient, mates 59 15 window in a similar condition took months to go, his had big engine/box and repro devon interior, got £31k in the end, maybe a figure worth comparing to?

Like i say, open to offers.

Personally i disn't like that one because of the paint blending being so obvious. But it was a cool bus all the same.
New year bump. I'm all ears for any offers, cheeky or otherwise.. you don't know if you don't ask

This is a very cool bus that a lot of us who already have a bus can appreciate, however, don't forget that many new comers to the scene who are often first timers, may be put off by the patina and not see it for what it is.

I'd be happy with this on my drive knowing what I now do about buses, would I have bought it as a first timer ? Not so sure...

Therefore first timers - don't be put off, this is
Its my first bus. If people don't get it then they won't buy it, thats ok.
